channel.title: AcerScape-317RSPS VPS HOSTED
channel.description:
What makes AcerScape different from other Servers?
AcerScape is a server dedicated to 100% Economy, PvM and PvP! We are a new 317 and looking for staff,
- Website: http://www.acerscape.enjin.com/
- Webclient: https://www.rspscoding.org/play/?server=AcerScape
- Download https://dl.dropbox.com/s/lo7de5cb30qbmql/AcerScape.jar
Features:
- ClanChat - Custom Home! - Duel Arena - Custom Mining - Decent and fun economy. - All special attacks. - 24.7 Uptime - Trading - Webclient - AutoCasting - 100% Private Messaging - Active helpful staff - Regular updates! - Completely Lag Free! - Runescape like Combat - Working Korasi’s Sword - Multi Barrages - Xp Counter - Working weapon specials and effects - Working curses prayer book, including turmoil! - All spell books, Moderns, Ancients and Lunars - Yell with custom tags - Daily Events! - Working Pest Control - Staff Of Light Special
[b][size=24pt]Some pictures in game![/size][/b]

item.title: AcerScape-317RSPS VPS HOSTED
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Anybody else go into the topic expecting to see the acer logo?

But in all seriousness good luck with your server.

May log in tonight when I’m afking runespan lol

-logged on for a little while today. Dude…brought back memories for me. Teamtorva(aka Final Judgement) was the source I released back in teh day when I didn’t know barely crap heh.

I can go ahead and say for sure now there will be plenty of dupes that you will have to fix as I have already stated. You will also need to fix npc clipping/walking.

Read full topic
